description: This file defines a React functional component named RecipeGrid that renders a responsive grid of RecipeCard components, handling cases where there are no items and providing interactive buttons for user actions.

methods.name: RecipeGrid
methods.description: React component rendering a grid of RecipeCards with optional callbacks for selection, favoriting, editing, and deleting recipes.

ctags.name: RecipeGrid
ctags.pattern: /^const RecipeGrid = ({ items, onSelect, isFavorite = () => false, onToggleFavorite = () => {}, on/
